channel.title: Video Games on Sven Eisenschmidt
channel.description: Recent content in Video Games on Sven Eisenschmidt

item.title: 2025 Wrapped
item.description: My year 2025 in numbers and highlights, wrapped-style. First attempt at summarizing an eventful year. More platforms offering wrapped/replay summaries obviously helped.

item.title: Death Stranding 2
item.description: Over the Xmas period I managed to finish Death Stranding 2. The game is a perfect mix between logistics, base building and shooter action for me.I like it more than the Metal Gear Solid games.
